channel.title: Comments on: after_create vs after_save vs after_commit
channel.description: Red Panthers - Experts in Ruby on Rails, System Design and Vue.js

item.title: By: Julien Lamarche
item.dc:creator: Julien Lamarche
item.description: "So they [after_save, after_create] will be executed before executing the sql statement to make permanent changes in the DB." https://stackoverflow.com/a/6249572/1611925 and other SO posts would disagree with that.
item.content:encoded: “So they [after_save, after_create] will be executed before executing the sql statement to make permanent changes in the DB.” https://stackoverflow.com/a/6249572/1611925 and other SO posts would disagree with that.
